label.value: peptide mass fingerprinting assay

definition.value: A mass spectrometry assay that measures the absolute mass of the cleaved peptides derived from an unknown protein of interest. These masses are then compared to values for known protein sequences to identify the unknown protein.

label.value: array based nucleic acid structure mapping assay

definition.value: An assay which aims to provide information about the in vivo organization/structure of nucleic acids using chemical or enzymatic probes using a microarray.

label.value: micrococcal nuclease digestion followed by tiling array assay

definition.value: An array based nucleic acid structure mapping assay that identifies nucleosome positions genome wide, by detection of regions protected by nucleosomes from digestion by micrococal nuclease using tiling array assays

label.value: ribosomal profiling by sequencing assay

definition.value: A RNA-seq assay that sequences only mRNA protected by the ribosome during translation.

label.value: assay for transposase-accessible chromatin using sequencing

definition.value: An assay to capture the location of open chromatin, DNA-binding proteins, individual nucleosomes and chromatin compaction at nucleotide resolution by Tn5 transposase insertion.

label.value: chromatin isolation by RNA purification sequencing assay

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that measures regions of the genome which are bound by a specific RNA (or a by a ribonucleoprotein containing the RNA of interest) using high-throughput sequencing.

label.value: self-transcribing active regulatory region sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that identifies the sequences that act as transcriptional enhancers in a direct, quantitative, and genome-wide manner from sheared genomic DNA.

label.value: carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay followed by sequencing assay

definition.value: A carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay to analyze the organization of chromosomes in an unbiased, genome-wide manner using high throughput sequening following carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture.

label.value: individual-nucleotide resolution cross-linking and immunoprecipitation sequencing assay

definition.value: A cross-linking immunoprecipitation high-throughput sequencing assay that identifies protein-RNA interactions using UV light to covalently bind proteins and RNA molecules, allowing for a very stringent purification of the linked protein-RNA complexes.

label.value: RNA Bind-n-Seq assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that comprehensively characterizes sequence and structural specificity of RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

label.value: polyA-site sequencing assay

definition.value: A RNA-seq assay that quantitatively profiles RNA polyadenylation at the transcriptome level.

label.value: surface plasmon resonance sensor chip

definition.value: A device that is used as a binding surface for ligand during a surface plasmon resonance assay, consisting of a glass plate to which a metal film is attached

label.value: enzyme-linked antibody

definition.value: A processed material that is comprised of an antibody that is covalently linked to an enzyme through bioconjugation. The enzyme can be used as a detection method when the enzyme's reaction produces a detectable signal, for example a color change when the substrate is added.

label.value: Illumina HiSeq 3000

definition.value: A DNA sequencer manufactured by Illumina corporation, with a single flow cell and a throughput of more than 200 Gb per day.

label.value: Illumina HiSeq 4000

definition.value: A DNA sequencer manufactured by Illumina corporation, with two flow cell and a throughput of more than 400 Gb per day.

label.value: 3D molecular structure determination assay of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A 3D structure determination of bound molecular complex assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional structure of a MHC:ligand complex.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from infectious challenge based on pathogen burden

definition.value: An in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from pathogen challenge using pathogen burden.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection after tumor burden challenge

definition.value: An in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from tumor challenge using tumor burden.

label.value: microarray assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A microarray assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: NMR assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A B cell epitope equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) determination assay that uses a nuclear magnetic resonance assay.

label.value: assay measuring biological activity resulting from T cell epitope:MHC:TCR binding

definition.value: A T cell epitope recognition assay that measures the immune response process resulting from the binding of a T cell receptor to epitope or the recongition of the epitope.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects production of chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific oncostatin M production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects oncostatin M production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring a binding constant of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope recognition assay that quantitavely characterizes the binding of a TCR with a ligand by determining a binding constant.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 22 production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 22 production by T cells.

label.value: in vitro assay measuring epitope specific T cell killing

definition.value: An in vitro cell killing assay that measures the killing of antigen presenting cells (APC) by T cells whose TCR recognizes an epitope presented by the APC.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that detects epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that detects epitope specific granzyme B release by T cells

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific oncostatin M production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects oncostatin M production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific perforin release by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects epitope specific perforin release by T cells.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring epitope specific proliferation of T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific proliferation assay that is performed in vivo.

label.value: in vitro assay measuring epitope specific proliferation of T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific proliferation assay that is performed on cells in vitro.

label.value: assay measuring qualitative binding of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: An assay that detects the binding of a MHC molecule with a ligand, and produces a qualitative measurement of the binding as an output.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring T cell epitope specific protection from challenge

definition.value: An efficacy of T cell epitope intervention experiment that uses a epitope protection experiment.

label.value: assay measuring T cell epitope specific suppression in vitro

definition.value: T cell epitope dependent biological activity assay that detects suppression of an in vitro response.

label.value: MHC ligand assay

definition.value: An immune epitope assay that characterizes the structrue of a MHC-ligand complex, or detects the processing and presentation of a ligand by an antigen presenting cell, or the binding of a ligand to an MHC molecule.

label.value: collection of specimens

definition.value: A material entity that has two or more specimens as its parts.

label.value: specimens derived from shared ancestor

definition.value: A collection of specimens derived from one common specimen via one or more material processing process(es).

label.value: specimen set collection process

definition.value: A specimen collection process that generates multiple specimens from one source (e.g. one organism) during a time period which for the purpose of the study can be considered to be taken at the same sampling time.

label.value: specimens collected in one encounter

definition.value: A collection of specimens that is collected from one source (e.g. one organism) during a time period which for the purpose of the study can be considered to be taken at the same sampling time.

label.value: human specimen set

definition.value: A specimen set that is collected from one person during a time period which for the purpose of the study can be considered to be taken at the same sampling time.

label.value: specimens collected longitudinally

definition.value: A collection of specimens that was derived from the same source material entity at different time points in order to observe changes in that entity.

label.value: reporter gene assay

definition.value: An assay that detects expression of a reporter gene that was inserted under the control of a regulatory sequence of interest.

label.value: enhancer activity detection by reporter gene assay

definition.value: A reporter gene assay that detects expression of a reporter gene that was inserted under the control of an enhancer of interest.

label.value: transcription cofactor activity region identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: A ChIP-seq assay that identifies regions of chromatin bound to a chromatin modifying protein, e.g. a histone acetyltransferase.
